column4: how do i start the bootloader administration tool?i try writing in terminal boot -admin but i get a "bash boot command not found":/ i also try write that in tty 1 an same results...when i write it in the bootloader at the startup (i press C for the command line) it says that the kernel must be loaded first :0...ty in advance 4 your time
